text: Bactriola vittulata is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Bates in 1885. It is known from Brazil, Bolivia, French Guiana, Panama, Trinidad and Tobago, and Venezuela.BioLib.cz - Bactriola vittulata. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Forsteriini Category:Beetles described in 1885
title: Bactriola vittulata
